HomePage.mainParagraph: Located in the 13th district of Paris since 1992, from rue Pascal to rue du Champ de l'Alouette, our traditional Vietnamese restaurant welcomes you in a simple and warm setting. All our dishes are prepared on the spot, using fresh produce, and will remind you of the subtle flavours of Vietnamese cuisine.

ModalComponent.mainParagraph:
You can order by phone at 
<spanLines>01 43 36 05 16</spanLines>
 Don't forget your tote bag ! 
Van Long team.
ModalComponent.visaAccepted: French credit card accepted from a minimum of 15 EUR
